meanings.definition: To process used or waste materials for use in new products.
meanings.sent1: The factory recycles old paper to make new notebooks.
meanings.sent2: Our town recycles plastic bottles, cans, and paper every week.
meanings.sent3: The clever robot recycles old parts to build new gadgets.
meanings.sent4: She recycles memories of her childhood to create beautiful stories.
meanings.sent5: The earth recycles water through the water cycle to ensure all living things have enough to drink.

meanings.definition: To repeat a process or cycle.
meanings.sent1: The washing machine recycles the same spin cycle over and over.
meanings.sent2: The seasons recycles every year, bringing spring, summer, fall, and winter.
meanings.sent3: The jokester recycles the same funny story at every party.
meanings.sent4: Life recycles challenges to help us grow stronger and wiser.
meanings.sent5: The clock recycles time, ticking away seconds, minutes, and hours without pause.
